geminiBrandBrief.brandDescription: Crystal Energy offers handcrafted jewelry and accessories made from natural crystals and gemstones. Their products are designed to promote personal growth, well-being, and spiritual development, combining aesthetic beauty with the energetic properties of the stones.
geminiBrandBrief.brandAudience: Individuals interested in natural healing, spirituality, personal development, and unique, handcrafted jewelry. The audience is primarily women looking for pieces that offer both aesthetic appeal and energetic benefits.
geminiBrandBrief.brandTone: Spiritual, empowering, caring, natural, and authentic.
geminiBrandBrief.brandMessage: Harness the natural power of crystals for personal growth and well-being.

aboutUs.paragraph1: At Crystal Energy, we are passionate about the healing power of crystals and natural gemstones.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our best-selling jewelry pieces, like the 'Aurelia' bracelet, are crafted to harness the unique energetic properties of each stone, bringing balance and positivity into your life.
aboutUs.paragraph3: That all ties into our mission to empower individuals on their journey of personal growth and well-being through the natural beauty and energy of crystals.

deliverabilitySnippet: Order Number: [ORDER_NUMBER] - Thank you for choosing Crystal Energy. Your items are being processed for dispatch. Keep this communication for your records. Included: 1x Crystal Earrings - [PRICE_1] 1x Natural Amethyst Cluster - [PRICE_2] 1x Black Tourmaline Bracelet - [PRICE_3] Discount Applied: [CODE_USED] - [DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] Subtotal: [SUBTOTAL_AMOUNT] Shipping: Standard Service Taxes: 0.00 Total: [TOTAL_AMOUNT] USD Shipping Information: Alex Green 789 Neutral Road Techville, XX 12345 Bulgaria Information: Alex Green 789 Neutral Road Techville, XX 12345 Bulgaria Shipping Method: Standard (5–7 business days) Delivery Information: Package expected 7–10 business days from send-out. Tracking details will be forwarded. Processing occurs Monday to Friday, excluding holidays. For delivery issues within the expected timeframe, please contact support. We are available to assist. 1. Processing: Standard timing is 1–2 business days. During peak periods, allow 3–5 business days before transit. 2. Shipping & Arrival: Standard delivery options apply to eligible orders. Expedited choices may be presented during checkout. Arrival times vary by method and region. 3. Payment & Security: Transactions are secured with encryption. Your data is protected. Payment methods accepted are displayed at checkout. 4. Returns & Resolution: Contact us within 7 days if an item arrives damaged or incorrect. Instructions for resolution will be provided. Shipping costs may be non-refundable in cases of no merchant error. 5. Privacy Statement: Information gathered is used for account management and order fulfillment. Data sharing is limited to legally required circumstances. 6. Rights & Content: All materials are the property of Crystal Energy or its licensors. Intellectual property rights are reserved. Thank you again from Crystal Energy. We value your business. Regards, The Crystal Energy Team
